MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G20 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1am to carry out safe repair work to an a fault on Burnbank Lane and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:44am on 28th January
